ingredients.item: 3 slices Farmhouse Batch Multi Seeded Bread, toasted

instructions.step: Cook the kale in boiling water for 4 minutes, drain and run under cold water. Remove any thick stalks and squeeze out excess liquid. Mix with the dressing and place on top of 1 slice of toast. Top this with coleslaw.

Spread another slice of toast with houmous and sprinkle over the cheese, place on top of the coleslaw. Top with the remaining slice of toast and cut in half. Serve with a few crisps and a handful of salad.
